h2_title: The Scorpionlord Boss Fight and Guide
content: If everything mentioned already wasn't bad enough to deal with, things will only get harder the more damage you deal. Many of his attacks will gain extended combos, making it harder to predict when you'll next get a chance to get some damage in.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Scorpionlord.md', within the main section titled 'The Scorpionlord', specifically from the subsection 'The Scorpionlord Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If everything mentioned already wasn't bad enough to deal with, things will only get harder the more damage you deal. Many of his attacks will gain extended combos, making it harder to predict when you'll next get a chance to get some damage in.
